reviewText: Every young person should see The  Story of Clotee. It's an eye opener for the young uniformed mind.
I Really love this movie very touching !
A great movie to have in the classroom. Teachers and students will enjoy.
I watched this "Dear America" movie. It has great acting and everthing seems so real. I only wish it were longer! But I really like it still.

I first began reading the Dear America series because of this book.  To actually see the book come alive in this movie was great.  I recommend this movie to anyone.  It is a great way to make history seem more real and exicting.  Thanks
